purpose: The email announces the call for papers for workshops at the ISSRE 2025 conference, which will take place from October 21-24, 2025, in SÃ£o Paulo, Brazil. It provides details about the workshops, their focus on software reliability, and important deadlines for paper submissions. The email also lists confirmed workshops and provides links for further information.
evidence_sentences: ISSRE (International Symposium on Software Reliability Engineering) is the leading conference on software reliability and it focuses on approaches, techniques, and tools for assessing, predicting, and improving the reliability, safety, and security of software systems.
The workshops aim at discussing recent developments and open challenges in engineering high-assurance software and systems, and they are open to exchange of ideas at an early stage before maturation.
